entry.title: einhornimmond/JobTrack: JobTrack is a lightweight tool designed to help you keep track of your job applications. It allows you to log application dates, responses, follow-ups, and other relevant details—perfect for organizing job searches or fulfilling documentation requirements.

entry.title: Santhosh785/MilkMate: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.
entry.content: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.

entry.title: SeloSlav/vibe-coding-starter-pack-2d-multiplayer-survival: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.
